name: CROSSOVER-Operation God-fall part one for Witch Girls Adventures.
name_original: CROSSOVER-Operation God-fall part one for Witch Girls Adventures.
description:
The WWC is raging war across the mundane and magical world.  As the world of Witch Girls Adventures, move into its next stage, one thing is certain, the world needs heroes. Crossover brings superheroes to the world of Witch Girls in a big way with new options for Mortals and Otherkins, a New world to explore, and more. Team up with the world's greatest teen heroes, fight villains, and deal with the ramifications of a corrupt WWC.

 Crossover takes the Magical Minutia of the same name to a new level adding so much more.:

HERO TROPES: Customize characters into superhero tropes including the Bravo, Loaner, and more.  Operation God Fall Adventure: A Full Adventure bringing the coming war to your Star's characters.  More Background on Nemesis Earth-

New Heroes and Villians.  99 Pages long!
